title: I'm not getting finance internship
content:
Hey guys I'm now actually in 6th sem of BBA finance specialisation and I've got many businesses development sales internship but I don't want in the sales field.
So I'm asking if any senior had done a finance internship which I can get now.Thank you.

comments.body: Please ask Dr Shailashree Haridas RR Campus for Internship drives ! She is heading the finance majors
